#summary Functional Checklist
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements

= Functional =

==R1 : Category==
  * R1.1 Category should contain the post items.
  * R1.2 Category compost of title, description.
  * R1.3 Manage the category by administrator or content manger.	
  * R1.4 Each category must have syndicate (RSS or ATOM) provide lastest items (by entry) data.

==R2 : Post Item==
  * R2.1 Each item must have category.
  * R2.2 Each item compost of title, description, created date time, name of author.
  * R2.3 Each item has score begin at 1 (first post)
  * R2.4 Each Item can plus (+1) or minut ()-1 score by another member.
  * R2.5 Only 1 score (can be +1 or -1) per member for each item.
  * R2.6 Manage the post item by administrator, content manager and the owner of each item.
  * R2.7 Each item must have syndicate (RSS or ATOM)  provide latest comment data.
  * R2.8 Member can merge item if the item is similar meaning to another items (issue #1)
  * R2.9 Item has link to another items, if the item is referred to another items (issue #1)

==R3 : Member==
  * ~~R3.1 Visitor can sign-up as a new member of this system via OpenID service.~~
  * ~~R3.2 Member can sign-in to the system via OpenID service.~~
  * R3.3 The Avatar of each member derived from Gravatar service.
  * R3.4 Member can manage the system depend on permission rule (administrator, content manager, member and visitor)
  * ~~R3.5 The member compost of first name, last name, *email* and OpenID url.~~
  * R3.6 The OpenID service 'll be the authentication system when member sign-in.
